Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • Item
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DealItem, ProductItem

extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Xinran Wang

    • Constructor Detail

      • Item

        public Item()
        Class constructor.

        Sets name, shipping and vendor fields to blank strings and sets price to be 0.

    • Method Detail

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string representation of the Item. Each field is labeled and the price is converted to a local currency format. If the hasError field is true, adds a warning message.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • convertElementToItem

        public abstract void convertElementToItem(org.jsoup.nodes.Element elem)
        Parses an HTML element to extract necessary information for an item. Replaces old item information with data from the new element.
        Parameters:
        elem - new element from which item information is to be extracted
